descriptionHTML:
Military HD Color Weather is a modern analog - digital Watch Face for Android Wear with color weather icons that can be setting directly from your Android device.

Military HD watch face for Android Wear device in a simple style with colorful icons display the weather forecast. Good read with the usual functions.

💡IMPORTANT: After installing the app from the Google Play on Your smartphone, it will receive a notification that a new application is to select the watch "Get Military ☀️ on your watch" and then "Install from Google Play". The app will be downloaded and installed on Your smart watch. Please note that as this is an HD watch face, the file is a bit larger and can take up to 3 minutes to transfer to your watch. This is normal.

This high contrast watch face for Android Wear device with a set of popular settings. Not interactive.

Features of the watch face:

- Analog watch face

- Digital watch face

- Day of month and day of the week

- Weather Color watch face - Two weather providers (OpenWeather, YR) - choose better for your location.

- The choice of temperature display in Celsius or Fahrenheit

- Second time digital and analog

- 12 or 24 hour watch display

- Digital watch battery indicator

- Animation

- Custom colors

- The timing of the backlight

This watchface works on circular watches and rectangular watches made for Android Wear.

To install:

1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.

2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Military as you watch face

- Then you will see a settings icon on top of the watch face

- Press on the settings icon on top of watch picker

- Now you can customize your watch face


Recommended by Google for Android Wear.


http://gamebooster.me
comments: Solid face; rogue pixel Looks nice on the LG watch Urbane, gold version. Please kill extra lit pixel at minute 47/48 marker. Thanks!
